trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> values.
A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
The FontStretches values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9.
Lower numeric values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.

|Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200%| For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
Specifies a condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Condensed represents 75% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents a condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies an expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Expanded represents 125% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents an expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies an extra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
ExtraCondensed represents 62.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents an extra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies an extra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
ExtraExpanded represents 150% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents an extra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies a medium <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Medium represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
The value of Medium is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.
A value that represents a medium <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies a normal <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Normal represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
The value of Normal is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.
A value that represents a normal <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies a semi-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
SemiCondensed represents 87.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents a semi-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies a semi-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
SemiExpanded represents 112.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents a semi-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies an ultra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
UltraCondensed represents 50% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents an ultra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Specifies an ultra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
UltraExpanded represents 200% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
A value that represents an ultra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
